title: Calories in 3 Slices of Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in 3 slice of pizza, including full nutrition breakdown per slice, totals for three, and easy tweaks for different toppings.
assumptions: Standard 14-inch cheese pizza, one slice is 1/8 of whole (~100 g), baked with mozzarella and tomato sauce; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pizza size, crust type, toppings, brand, and baking method. Check labels or apps for specific varieties.

quick_answer.text: Three slices of cheese pizza provide ~855 kcal and ~36 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.a: About 285 kcal for a standard cheese slice.
